title: Entangled Chaos
description: Dahlia lives life on her own terms, relying on noone.She dances with danger, using herself as a pawn in the game of survival.Behind her mask, Dahlia hides, shielding her weakness.A weakness is a threat that will destroy you.Dahlia’s is back and he sees right through her mask.He’s the one who created it.Years ago, he made a deal with the devil to spare her life.Kai let her go and he played his part as the puppet they created.When he’s thrown back into her life, Kai knows that he can never leave again.The puppet cut his strings and became the puppetmaster, leaving their fate in his hands. But, life is precarious when the devil is breathing down your neck.And one mistake is all it takes for Hell to rise again.
author: C.M. Radcliff
